children.text: To use Lenses in Snapchat follow the steps below:      Go to the Camera screen in Snapchat.     Press and hold on a face! Lens options will appear below.     Swipe left to select the Lens you want to use.     Follow any action prompts that appear, like ‘Raise Your Eyebrows.’     Tap the capture button to take a Snap, or press and hold on the capture button to record a video. To use Lenses in Snapchat follow the steps below:      Go to the Camera screen in Snapchat.     Press and hold on a face! Lens options will appear below.     Swipe left to select the Lens you want to use.     Follow any action prompts that appear, like ‘Raise Your Eyebrows.’     Tap the capture button to take a Snap, or press and hold on the capture button to record a video.
